title: AGES - The Master Christian Library V.8 - Ages
description:
The Master Christian Library: Version 8 on CD-ROM (Windows / Mac)
By Ages Software

Format: all PDFs on 2 .iso disc images.

An updated collection of over 1000 books in 20 volumes on CD including the Whole Bible Classic Sermon Collection, Cyclopedia of Biblical, Theological and Ecclesiastical Literature, Expositor's Bible, Biblical Illustrator, Charles H. Spurgeon Collection, John Calvin Collection, Arthur Pink Collection, John Owen Collection, Jonathan Edwards-Timothy Dwight Collection, B.H.Carroll Collection, Pulpit Commentary, Benjamin B.Warfield Collection, Classic Commentary Collection, Contemporary Evangelical Thought Collection, Systematic Theologies, Classic Theological Collection, John Bunyan Collection, Biblical and Church History Collection. 

You can own thousands of dollars worth of the greatest literature in the history of Christianity. You get the 38 volumes of the writings of the Early Church Fathers, the complete works of Jonathan Edwards, John Wesley, Charles Finney, and much more. You get the ten volume commentary set on the Old Testament by Keil and Delitzsch, the 8 volume commentary on the Bible by Adam Clarke, the complete unabridged six volume Matthew Henry commentary, Systematic theologies, biographies, and much more 

This is a 2 CD set containing more PDF books than can be listed here.
See list of books: bmsoftware.com/masterchristianlibrary.htm 

Slow seed, be patient.
